## FrameStatsArray class

 Only exported for testing.

Instead of passing around an array of objects, we store the frame statistics as an object of arrays. This allows convenient computations from \[\[RingBuffer\]\],

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class FrameStatsArray 
```
